A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie hurt me on a very personal level\, what it has done to the Star Wars mythos and arguably the most beloved Star Wars character of all time\, Luke Skywalker\, is unforgivable. Riddled with plot holes and questionable plot line choices that make little to no sense. I only give this movie a half star because it is pretty to look at. Pretty movie\, horrible Star Wars movie.
